reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) MICB 301 or (b) all of MICB 201, MICB 325.
The course will not be offered for the 2017W academic year.

MICB 424 is not offered in the 2017W academic year.
courseName: Cellular Dynamics of Pathogenic and Environmental Bacteria
description: Regulatory and signalling networks in bacterial cells with emphasis on how cellular and environmental cues are detected and integrated during different growth or life history stages of important pathogenic and environmental bacteria.
